.. :changelog:

History
-------

1.2.3 (2019-01-09)
++++++++++++++++++

- Fix exception `.message` bug.

1.2.2 (2016-01-11)
++++++++++++++++++

- Increase default timeout to 90 seconds (@jamespaden)

1.2.1 (2013-08-12)
++++++++++++++++++

- Decode UTF-8 JSON responses

1.2 (2013-08-11)
++++++++++++++++++

- Python 3.3.2 compatibility


1.1 (2013-05-23)
++++++++++++++++++

- Added timeout to HTTP requests (@jesseh)


1.0 (2011-11-29)
++++++++++++++++++

- Created
